column4: Hi there; I'm looking for a program that will overwrite all the free space in a given filesystem with zeros.  Is this possible?  I want the free space in my filesystem to be filled with zeros.. I've been using the command "dd if=/dev/zero of=/dev/sda" from the LiveCD before I install.  There should be a better way, though!
wow, so many good references.  Thanks a lot :)
Check out shred for the future.  (it'll securely delete things, but it wont do it on "all my freespace", it will however do "my whole drive")
Haha, I'm actually not trying to securely delete things.
